leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-序列分析与注释生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集/解析→QC→比对/组装→注释→评测→工作流

tools.name: HyPPO
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid prediction tool for paralogs and orthologs
tools.detailed_description: HyPPO (Hybrid Prediction of Paralogs and Orthologs) is a tool designed to infer orthology and paralogy relationships between genes, combining different prediction strategies.

tools.name: TIRmite
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for annotating MITEs and DNA-Transposons using TIR-pHMM models
tools.detailed_description: TIRmite maps TIR-pHMM models to genomic sequences to annotate Miniature Inverted-repeat Transposable Elements (MITEs) and complete DNA-Transposons.

tools.name: GeneOrthology
tools.one_line_profile: R package for collecting gene ortholog information from NCBI
tools.detailed_description: A utility package providing functions and datasets to retrieve and organize gene orthology information sourced from NCBI, facilitating comparative genomic analysis.

tools.name: FeGenie
tools.one_line_profile: HMM-based identification of iron-related genes and operons
tools.detailed_description: FeGenie is a bioinformatics tool that uses Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) to identify and categorize genes and operons involved in iron acquisition and metabolism in genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: MagicLamp
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for targeted annotation using HMM sets
tools.detailed_description: MagicLamp is a platform designed for the targeted annotation of genomic, metagenomic, and metatranscriptomic datasets using curated sets of Hidden Markov Models (HMMs).

tools.name: stmp
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence to Medical Phenotypes pipeline
tools.detailed_description: STMP is a comprehensive pipeline for variant annotation, prioritization, and pharmacogenomics analysis, specifically designed for analyzing genomic trios (mother, father, child) to link sequence data to medical phenotypes.

tools.name: MFannot
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for mitochondrial and plastid genomes
tools.detailed_description: MFannot is a specialized program for annotating organelle genomes, specifically mitochondria and plastids, identifying genes, tRNAs, and introns.

tools.name: eukan
tools.one_line_profile: Eukaryotic genome annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Eukan is a pipeline designed for the annotation of eukaryotic genomes, automating the process of gene prediction and functional annotation.

tools.name: HaMStR
tools.one_line_profile: Feature-aware orthology prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: HaMStR is a tool for determining orthology relationships between genes, utilizing Hidden Markov Models and feature-aware strategies to improve prediction accuracy.

tools.name: PhyloProfile
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis tool for phylogenetic profiles
tools.detailed_description: PhyloProfile is an R-based tool for visualizing and analyzing phylogenetic profiles, helping researchers explore the evolutionary history and functional associations of genes across species.

tools.name: fDOG
tools.one_line_profile: Feature-aware Directed OrtholoG search tool
tools.detailed_description: fDOG (Feature-aware Directed OrtholoG search) is a tool for identifying orthologous genes in genomic sequences, incorporating feature information to enhance search sensitivity and specificity.

tools.name: Watershed
tools.one_line_profile: Model for prioritizing functional rare genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: Watershed is a probabilistic model that integrates genomic annotations and RNA-seq data to prioritize rare genetic variants that are likely to have functional effects.

tools.name: coRdon
tools.one_line_profile: R package for codon usage analysis and gene expressivity prediction
tools.detailed_description: coRdon is an R/Bioconductor package used for analyzing codon usage patterns in DNA sequences and predicting gene expressivity based on codon bias.

tools.name: ProteomeLM
tools.one_line_profile: Proteome-scale language model for protein interaction and essentiality prediction
tools.detailed_description: ProteomeLM is a protein language model designed to predict protein-protein interactions and gene essentiality across various taxa by learning from proteome-scale sequence data.

tools.name: Control-FREEC
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number and genotype annotation tool for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Control-FREEC is a tool for detecting copy number variations (CNVs) and loss of heterozygosity (LOH) in whole genome and whole exome sequencing data, providing genotype annotations.

tools.name: geneXtendeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for functional annotation of ChIP-seq data
tools.detailed_description: geneXtendeR is an R/Bioconductor package designed to optimize the functional annotation of ChIP-seq peaks by extending gene boundaries to capture distal regulatory elements.

tools.name: SURFY2
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning classifier for human surfaceome prediction
tools.detailed_description: SURFY2 is a machine learning-based tool that predicts whether a human transmembrane protein is located at the cell surface or in intracellular membranes, utilizing an ensemble of classifiers and feature engineering.

tools.name: FANTASIA
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation tool based on embedding space similarity
tools.detailed_description: FANTASIA (Functional ANnoTAtion based on embedding space SImilArity) is a tool that leverages embedding representations of biological sequences to perform functional annotation through similarity search.

tools.name: TOSTADAS
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for sequence triage, annotation, and database submission
tools.detailed_description: TOSTADAS is a toolkit developed by the CDC for the triage, annotation, and submission of genomic sequence data to public databases, streamlining public health bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: drugreflector
tools.one_line_profile: Drug ranking from gene expression signatures
tools.detailed_description: DrugReflector uses ensemble neural network models to rank compounds and predict their efficacy based on gene expression signatures, aiding in drug discovery and repurposing.

tools.name: FunGAP
tools.one_line_profile: Fungal Genome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: FunGAP is a comprehensive pipeline specifically designed for the prediction and annotation of genes in fungal genomes, integrating multiple evidence sources for high-quality annotation.

tools.name: FastOMA
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable software for orthology inference
tools.detailed_description: FastOMA is a computationally efficient and scalable software package for inferring orthology relationships between genes across large numbers of genomes.

tools.name: OMAnnotator
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus genome annotation tool using OMA
tools.detailed_description: OMAnnotator utilizes the OMA (Orthologous MAtrix) database and algorithms to provide consensus functional annotations for genomes based on orthology information.

tools.name: REAT
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit for genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for eukaryotic genome annotation, integrating various tools to predict gene structures and functions.

tools.name: HMMER
tools.one_line_profile: Biological sequence analysis using profile hidden Markov models
tools.detailed_description: HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs, and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).

tools.name: Apollo
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative genome annotation editor
tools.detailed_description: Apollo is a genome annotation editor that allows researchers to collaborate on annotating genomes in real-time, running as a plugin within JBrowse.

tools.name: AUGUSTUS
tools.one_line_profile: Gene prediction tool for eukaryotic genomes
tools.detailed_description: AUGUSTUS is a program that predicts genes in eukaryotic genomic sequences. It can be used as an ab initio gene finder or incorporate hints from RNA-Seq or protein alignments.

tools.name: BRAKER
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for eukaryotic gene structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: BRAKER is a pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein coding gene structures using GeneMark-ES/ET/EP/ETP and AUGUSTUS in novel eukaryotic genomes.

tools.name: GALBA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated gene prediction pipeline using protein homology
tools.detailed_description: GALBA is a pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein coding gene structures with AUGUSTUS in novel eukaryotic genomes, specifically utilizing high-quality proteins from related species.

tools.name: Tiberius
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based gene finder
tools.detailed_description: Tiberius is a gene finder that utilizes deep learning techniques to predict gene structures in genomic sequences.

tools.name: GenomeView
tools.one_line_profile: Stand-alone genome browser and editor
tools.detailed_description: GenomeView is a genome browser and editor that provides interactive visualization of sequences, annotations, alignments, and more.

tools.name: Genet
tools.one_line_profile: Library for genome editing and CRISPR gRNA design
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for genome editing tasks, including CRISPR gRNA design and prediction of editing outcomes.

tools.name: oncoPredict
tools.one_line_profile: Drug response and drug-gene association prediction
tools.detailed_description: An R package for predicting drug response in cancer samples and identifying drug-gene associations.

tools.name: OrthoHMM
tools.one_line_profile: Inference of ortholog groups using Hidden Markov Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improved inference of ortholog groups utilizing Hidden Markov Models to analyze sequence relationships.

tools.name: OrthoSnap
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval of single-copy orthologs from gene family trees
tools.detailed_description: A tree splitting and pruning algorithm designed to identify and retrieve single-copy orthologs from larger gene family trees.

tools.name: Seave
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for filtering and annotating genetic variants
tools.detailed_description: Seave is a web-based platform for filtering and annotating genomic variants, supporting various inheritance patterns and disease database integrations.

tools.name: SNAP
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-HMM-based Nucleic Acid Parser for gene prediction
tools.detailed_description: SNAP is a general purpose gene finding program suitable for both eukaryotic and prokaryotic genomes.

tools.name: RAPToR
tools.one_line_profile: Developmental age prediction from transcriptome data
tools.detailed_description: RAPToR (Real Age Prediction from Transcriptome staging on Reference) estimates the developmental age of samples based on their gene expression profiles.

tools.name: MGEScan
tools.one_line_profile: System for identifying retrotransposons in genomes
tools.detailed_description: MGEScan is a Galaxy-based system designed to identify mobile genetic elements, specifically retrotransposons, within genomic sequences.

tools.name: FASSO
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Annotations using Sequence and Structure Orthology
tools.detailed_description: FASSO is a tool for generating functional annotations by leveraging both sequence and structural orthology information.

tools.name: AlphaMap
tools.one_line_profile: Visual annotation of proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for the visual annotation of proteomics data, integrating sequence-specific knowledge.

tools.name: PROST
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Ortholog Search Tool for remote homologs
tools.detailed_description: PROST (PRotein Ortholog Search Tool) is a deep learning-based tool designed to detect remote homologs and orthologs accurately and quickly.

tools.name: GAAS
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Assembly and Annotation Service utilities
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools used for the Genome Assembly and Annotation Service, providing various utilities for bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: NBIS Annotation Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflows for Genome Annotation
tools.detailed_description: A set of reproducible workflows written in Nextflow for performing genome annotation tasks.

tools.name: GDAN-TMP Models
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer subtype prediction models and tools
tools.detailed_description: Containerized tools and models for predicting cancer subtypes based on gene expression, miRNA, DNA methylation, and other genomic data.

tools.name: CLEAN-Contact
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme functional annotation with structural inference
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a contrastive learning-enabled method for enzyme functional annotation prediction that incorporates structural inference.

tools.name: Mantis
tools.one_line_profile: Protein sequence annotation system
tools.detailed_description: Mantis is a standalone tool for annotating protein sequences, integrating multiple reference data sources for comprehensive functional prediction.

tools.name: BuscoOrthoPhylo
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for BUSCO-based phylogenetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper script to automate the process of concatenating, aligning, and constructing phylogenetic trees from BUSCO results.

tools.name: FunFinder_Pangenome
tools.one_line_profile: Pangenome analysis of functional annotations
tools.detailed_description: Tools for analyzing Funannotate and Orthofinder outputs in the context of pangenome results.

tools.name: PSALM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein sequence annotation using hierarchical language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging protein language models to annotate protein sequences with functional properties, aiming to overcome limitations of alignment-based methods.

tools.name: CNView
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and annotation of Copy Number Variants (CNVs)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the visualization and annotation of CNVs from population-scale whole-genome sequencing data, facilitating the interpretation of structural variations.

tools.name: HRIBO
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput annotation workflow for bacterial Ribo-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for reproducible analysis of bacterial Ribo-seq data, performing pre-processing, QC, and annotation-independent ORF prediction.

tools.name: SwiftOrtho
tools.one_line_profile: High performance tool for ortholog and paralog identification
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to identify orthologs and paralogs across genomes efficiently, supporting comparative genomics studies.

tools.name: Pynteny
tools.one_line_profile: Synteny-aware HMM search tool for sequence databases
tools.detailed_description: A tool to query sequence databases using Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) arranged in predefined synteny structures, aiding in the discovery of gene clusters.

tools.name: VirMake
tools.one_line_profile: Viral metagenomic data analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis, offering taxonomic and functional annotation with HPC support.

tools.name: gcap
tools.one_line_profile: Gene-level Circular Amplicon Prediction from WES data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to detect extrachromosomal DNA (ecDNA) amplifications from whole-exome sequencing (WES) data and copy number profiles.

tools.name: ANNOgesic
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA-Seq based annotation tool for bacteria/archaea
tools.detailed_description: A modular pipeline for correcting and enriching genome annotations using RNA-Seq data, specifically designed for bacterial and archaeal genomes.

tools.name: LipidLynxX
tools.one_line_profile: Lipid annotation conversion and functional analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert, cross-match, and link lipid annotations to ontologies and pathways, facilitating systems-wide integration of lipidome dynamics.

tools.name: neofox
tools.one_line_profile: Neoantigen annotation and prioritization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for annotating mutated peptide sequences with potential neoantigen descriptors to aid in cancer immunotherapy research.

tools.name: franklin
tools.one_line_profile: DNA sequence annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for DNA sequence annotation, likely providing a user interface or command line utility for annotating genomic features.

tools.name: BATH
tools.one_line_profile: Better Alignments with Translated HMMER
tools.detailed_description: A tool that improves sequence alignments by using translated HMMER searches, useful for detecting remote homologies.

tools.name: ksrates
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-genome duplication positioning tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to position whole-genome duplications relative to speciation events using substitution-rate-adjusted mixed paralog-ortholog Ks distributions.

tools.name: ICAnet
tools.one_line_profile: Independent Component Analysis for cell clustering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A method using Independent Component Analysis to decipher functional modules for improved cell clustering and annotation in single-cell data.

tools.name: TFTF
tools.one_line_profile: Transcription Factor Target Finder
tools.detailed_description: An R package for predicting transcription factor target genes and identifying upstream transcription factors of target genes.

tools.name: DRAM
tools.one_line_profile: Distilled and Refined Annotation of Metabolism
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the annotation and curation of function for microbial and viral genomes, focusing on metabolic profiling.

tools.name: EGN
tools.one_line_profile: Exemplar Guided Deep Neural Network for Spatial Transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting gene expression in spatial transcriptomics analysis.

tools.name: MAKER
tools.one_line_profile: Portable and easily configurable genome annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A widely used pipeline for genome annotation that integrates evidence from multiple sources (ESTs, proteins, ab initio predictors) to annotate eukaryotic genomes.

tools.name: Immuannot
tools.one_line_profile: Immunological gene typing and annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for the typing and annotation of immunological genes in genome assemblies.

tools.name: mclSTExp
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Contrastive Learning for Spatial Gene Expression Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using histology images and contrastive learning to predict spatial gene expression.

tools.name: BioAider
tools.one_line_profile: Desktop platform for viral genome annotation and mutation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A desktop application for quick sequence annotation and mutation analysis, optimized for large-scale viral genome sequencing data.

tools.name: hpcleap_dnds
tools.one_line_profile: Sliding window dN/dS vs functional domain comparison tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compare selective pressures (dN/dS) acting along protein sequences against functional protein domain annotations.

tools.name: graphcast-predict
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction wrapper for GraphCast weather model
tools.detailed_description: A tool/script to facilitate making weather predictions using the GraphCast AI model with CDS and pysolar data.

tools.name: deepSimDEF
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning models for functional analysis of genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool offering deep learning models for functional analysis of genes using Gene Ontology annotations of gene products.

tools.name: ORFanage
tools.one_line_profile: ORF search tool for spliced genomes guided by reference annotation
tools.detailed_description: An efficient method to search for Open Reading Frames (ORFs) in spliced genomes, using reference annotations to maximize protein similarity.

tools.name: ORF-RATER
tools.one_line_profile: Regression-based annotation of protein-coding sequences from ribosome profiling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for annotating protein-coding sequences using regression models on ribosome profiling data.

tools.name: genofan
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation workflow for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the functional annotation of sets of bacterial genomes.

tools.name: pyaragorn
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for ARAGORN tRNA finder
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to ARAGORN, a tool for detecting tRNA and tmRNA genes.

tools.name: pyhmmer
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for HMMER3
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to HMMER3, enabling efficient sequence analysis and profile HMM searches within Python.

tools.name: pyrodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Prodigal ORF finder
tools.detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to Prodigal, a popular gene prediction tool for prokaryotic genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: phylogenomics_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for phylogenomic inference using single copy genes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that uses single copy nuclear genes and 4DTv sites to infer phylogenies between related taxa after gene family clustering.

tools.name: distillR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for distilling functional annotations
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to distill and summarize functional annotations of bacterial genomes and metagenomes.

tools.name: prodigal-gv
tools.one_line_profile: Gene calling tool optimized for giant viruses and alternative genetic codes
tools.detailed_description: A fork of the Prodigal gene prediction tool, specifically modified to improve gene calling performance for giant viruses (NCLDVs) and viruses utilizing alternative genetic codes.

tools.name: rhmmer
tools.one_line_profile: R interface utilities for the HMMER sequence analysis suite
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R utilities designed to facilitate working with HMMER, allowing users to parse HMMER output and integrate profile HMM searches into R-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: Batch-Fasta-Interpro
tools.one_line_profile: Batch processing utility for InterProScan via EBI web services
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to submit multi-sequence FASTA files to the EBI InterProScan web service, enabling batch functional annotation of protein sequences without local installation of the full InterProScan database.

tools.name: ggCaller
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based gene caller for bacterial population genomics
tools.detailed_description: A gene calling and annotation tool that works directly on Bifrost graphs (colored de Bruijn graphs), enabling consistent gene finding and clustering across population-scale bacterial datasets without individual assembly.

tools.name: GEAN
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for comparing genomic sequences and annotations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to handle genomic sequence and genome structure annotation files, facilitating comparison and analysis between inbreeding lines and species.

tools.name: assembly-annotation-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for plant genome assembly and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow for plant genomics that automates the process of genome assembly and subsequent structural and functional annotation.

tools.name: micronota
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation pipeline for microbial genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A customizable pipeline for annotating microbial genomes and metagenomic assemblies, integrating various tools to predict features and assign functions.

tools.name: braker-docker
tools.one_line_profile: Docker container for the BRAKER gene prediction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A containerized deployment of the BRAKER gene finder, facilitating the setup and execution of eukaryotic gene prediction workflows.

tools.name: RESCRIPt
tools.one_line_profile: Reference sequence annotation and curation pipeline for QIIME 2
tools.detailed_description: A QIIME 2 plugin for processing, annotating, and curating reference sequence databases (like SILVA or Greengenes) for use in microbiome taxonomy classification.

tools.name: BLEEP
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-modal contrastive learning for spatial gene expression prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that predicts spatially resolved gene expression profiles directly from H&E histology images using bi-modal contrastive learning.

tools.name: KIPEs
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-based identification of pathway enzymes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automatic annotation of biosynthetic pathways (specifically flavonoids) in transcriptome or genome assemblies using a knowledge-based approach.

tools.name: abstar
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable antibody sequence annotation and VDJ assignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for VDJ germline assignment and functional annotation of antibody (BCR) sequences, capable of scaling from single sequences to billions of reads.

tools.name: ABC-Enhancer-Gene-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-by-Contact model for enhancer-gene connection prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool to predict cell-type specific enhancer-gene connections using the Activity-by-Contact (ABC) model, integrating chromatin accessibility and histone modification data.

tools.name: covviz
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive multi-sample genome coverage visualizer
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed to display genome coverage across multiple samples, helping to identify coverage anomalies alongside annotations and metadata.

tools.name: GeneFinder.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Gene finding framework for the Julia language
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing algorithms and utilities for identifying coding regions (ORFs) and predicting genes in genomic sequences.

tools.name: QTG_Finder
tools.one_line_profile: Prioritization tool for QTL causal genes
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based tool to prioritize candidate causal genes within Quantitative Trait Loci (QTL) regions, aiding in the identification of genes responsible for phenotypic traits.

tools.name: TargetPred
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of therapeutic targets from gene-disease associations
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the in silico prediction of novel therapeutic targets by analyzing gene-disease association data.

tools.name: annotate_my_genomes
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for animal genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A genome annotation pipeline implemented in Nextflow that utilizes both short and long sequencing read alignments to annotate animal genomes.

tools.name: Target-Prediction-Crawler
tools.one_line_profile: Crawler for molecular target prediction databases
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automatically crawl and standardize target information from various molecular target prediction websites (SwissTargetPrediction, SEA, SuperPred), facilitating data acquisition for drug discovery.

tools.name: CHAP
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation of ion channel structures
tools.detailed_description: The Channel Annotation Package (CHAP) is a tool for the functional annotation of ion channel structures, analyzing pore dimensions and hydrophobicity.

tools.name: A-pro
tools.one_line_profile: ASTRAL extension for paralogs and orthologs
tools.detailed_description: A software tool extending ASTRAL to handle multi-copy gene family trees, enabling species tree inference using both paralogs and orthologs.

tools.name: jannovar
tools.one_line_profile: Variant annotation and functional impact prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool and library for annotating VCF variants with functional impact information and data from various genomic databases.

tools.name: lep_fusion_fission_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of chromosome fusion/fission events in Lepidoptera
tools.detailed_description: A tool to identify chromosomal fusion and fission events and assign ancestral linkage units in Lepidopteran genomes using BUSCO genes as markers.

tools.name: CancerTypePrediction
tools.one_line_profile: CNN models for cancer type prediction from gene expression
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) models designed to predict cancer types based on gene expression data.

tools.name: nf-ncov-voc
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for SARS-CoV-2 mutation profiling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for generating mutation profiles of SARS-CoV-2 or Mpox genomes, designed to work with VIRUS-MVP for visualization.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation pipeline for eukaryotic MAGs
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), automating the use of various gene predictors.

tools.name: TE-Aid
tools.one_line_profile: Helper tool for transposable element curation
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to assist in the manual curation and annotation of transposable element (TE) consensus sequences.

tools.name: dnaPipeTE
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly and annotation pipeline for transposable elements
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to find, annotate, and quantify Transposable Elements (TEs) in small samples of NGS datasets without requiring a reference genome assembly.

tools.name: CellFunTopic
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation for single-cell transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the functional annotation of single-cell transcriptomics data, likely using topic modeling or similar approaches to identify functional states.

tools.name: PhyloGeneious
tools.one_line_profile: HPC-optimized orthology inference tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for orthology inference optimized for High Performance Computing (HPC) environments, facilitating large-scale phylogenetic analyses.

tools.name: MicrobeAnnotator
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolic annotation pipeline for microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly pipeline for the comprehensive metabolic annotation of microbial genomes and metagenomes, utilizing databases like KEGG and RefSeq.

tools.name: LncADeep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for lncRNA identification and annotation
tools.detailed_description: An ab initio tool based on deep learning for the identification and functional annotation of long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs).

tools.name: euryale
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic taxonomic classification and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline based on MEDUSA for the taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic sequencing reads.

tools.name: OrthoEvolution
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of orthologous genes
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to aid in the analysis, filtering, and visualization of orthologous gene datasets.

tools.name: Glimmer-MG
tools.one_line_profile: Gene prediction for metagenomic sequences
tools.detailed_description: A gene finder specifically designed for metagenomic sequences, augmenting Glimmer with phylogenetic classification and clustering to improve accuracy on fragmented data.

tools.name: OrthoFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic orthology inference for comparative genomics
tools.detailed_description: A fast, accurate, and comprehensive platform for comparative genomics that infers orthogroups, orthologs, gene trees, and species trees from proteomes.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Amino-Acid Sequence Annotation Predictor
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting annotations from amino acid sequences, likely using machine learning or sequence features.

tools.name: GenomeKit
tools.one_line_profile: Fast access library for genomic resources and annotations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for fast and easy access to genomic resources, including sequences, data tracks, and annotations, optimized for performance.

tools.name: genotate
tools.one_line_profile: Prokaryotic and phage genome annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the annotation of prokaryotic and phage genomes, facilitating the identification of genomic features.

tools.name: IPRStats
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical visualization tool for InterProScan results
tools.detailed_description: A statistical tool that eases the analysis of InterProScan results by generating charts and tables with links to additional information, helping to interpret functional annotation data.

tools.name: OASIS
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Annotation System for Insertion Sequences
tools.detailed_description: A system designed to optimize the annotation of insertion sequences within genomes, aiding in the identification of mobile genetic elements.

tools.name: hamburger
tools.one_line_profile: HMmer Based UndeRstandinG of gene clustERs
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing HMMER for the analysis and understanding of gene clusters, useful for identifying functionally related groups of genes.

tools.name: ortho2align
tools.one_line_profile: lncRNA ortholog discovery tool based on synteny
tools.detailed_description: A CLI tool for discovering lncRNA orthologs based on syntenic regions and statistical assessment of alignment nonrandomness.

tools.name: UNIFAN
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised cell functional annotation for single-cell RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A tool for unsupervised functional annotation of cells using single-cell RNA-Seq data, aiding in cell type identification and functional characterization.

tools.name: LTRpred
tools.one_line_profile: De novo annotation of young retrotransposons
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the de novo annotation of young retrotransposons in genomes, facilitating the study of transposable elements.

tools.name: orthologr
tools.one_line_profile: Genome wide orthology inference and dNdS estimation
tools.detailed_description: An R package for genome-wide orthology inference and the estimation of dN/dS ratios, useful for evolutionary biology and comparative genomics.

tools.name: InterProScan
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-scale protein function classification
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool for genome-scale protein function classification, integrating predictive models from various member databases of the InterPro consortium.

tools.name: InterProScan 6
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow-based genome-scale protein function classification
tools.detailed_description: The Nextflow implementation of InterProScan, enabling scalable and reproducible genome-scale protein function classification workflows.

tools.name: Captus
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly of Phylogenomic Datasets from High-Throughput Sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assembling phylogenomic datasets from HTS data, supporting the extraction of targeted loci for phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: GET_HOMOLOGUES
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile software package for pan-genome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A software package for pan-genome analysis, capable of clustering sequences to identify homologous groups across multiple genomes.

tools.name: eggnog-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Fast genome-wide functional annotation through orthology assignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast functional annotation of novel sequences using precomputed orthology assignments from the eggNOG database.

tools.name: HumAS-HMMER
tools.one_line_profile: Generates monomeric annotations of high order repeats of human alpha satellites
tools.detailed_description: A tool using HMMER to generate monomeric annotations for high-order repeats in human alpha satellite DNA.

tools.name: gawn
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Annotation Without Nightmares
tools.detailed_description: A simplified pipeline for genome annotation, designed to make the process more accessible and less error-prone.

tools.name: kir-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for calling SNPs, alleles, and haplotypes for KIR genes
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit specifically designed for analyzing KIR genes from NGS data, including SNP calling, allele identification, and haplotype estimation.

tools.name: brick
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive data visualisation for bacterial genome annotations
tools.detailed_description: A tool that creates BRIG-like interactive visualizations for bacterial genome annotations and comparisons, facilitating genomic data exploration.

tools.name: GO FEAT
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid web-based functional annotation tool for genomic and transcriptomic data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for rapid functional annotation of genomic and transcriptomic sequences using Gene Ontology.

tools.name: phylopypruner
tools.one_line_profile: Tree-based orthology inference and contamination reduction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for tree-based orthology inference that includes functionality for reducing contamination in phylogenomic datasets.

tools.name: bacannot
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for prokaryotic genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A generic pipeline for prokaryotic genome annotation and interrogation, providing interactive reports and analysis capabilities.

tools.name: Annocript
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotation of de-novo generated transcriptomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the functional annotation of de novo assembled transcriptomes, integrating BLAST, domain search, and other analyses.

tools.name: RefFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating and screening reference genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for evaluating and ranking candidate reference genes for normalization in gene expression experiments (e.g., qPCR).

tools.name: TAR-scRNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: scRNA-seq analysis using transcriptionally active regions
tools.detailed_description: A method for scRNA-seq analysis that goes beyond standard gene annotations by using transcriptionally active regions (TARs) generated from alignment data.

tools.name: OUTRIDER
tools.one_line_profile: Framework to find aberrantly expressed genes in RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R-based framework for identifying outlier gene expression events in RNA-seq data, useful for rare disease diagnostics.

tools.name: GeneMark-EP-plus
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic eukaryotic gene prediction supported by spliced aligned proteins
tools.detailed_description: A gene prediction tool for eukaryotic genomes that utilizes spliced alignments of proteins to improve accuracy.

tools.name: GeneMark-ETP
tools.one_line_profile: Gene finding in eukaryotic genomes supported by transcriptome and protein homology
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive gene finding tool for eukaryotes that integrates genomic, transcriptomic, and protein homology evidence.

tools.name: MetaGeneMark-2
tools.one_line_profile: Improved Gene Prediction in Metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: An advanced version of MetaGeneMark for identifying genes in metagenomic sequences.

tools.name: baktfold
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation of bacterial genomes using protein structural information
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid and standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs, and plasmids by leveraging protein structural information.

tools.name: POInT
tools.one_line_profile: Polyploidy Orthology Inference Tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for inferring orthology in the context of polyploidy, modeling the evolution of duplicate genes.

tools.name: metascan
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolic scanning and annotation of Metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the metabolic scanning and functional annotation of metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: GeneSCF
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Set Clustering based on Functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for clustering gene sets based on functional annotations (e.g., GO, KEGG), facilitating functional enrichment analysis.

tools.name: GAG
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Annotation Generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates NCBI .tbl files and other formats for genome annotations, simplifying submission and format conversion.

tools.name: GenomeTools
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile genome analysis system
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of tools for genome analysis, including annotation handling, sequence processing, and visualization.

tools.name: ALOFT
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation Of Loss-of-Function Transcripts
tools.detailed_description: A tool for providing extensive functional annotations to loss-of-function variants in the human genome, aiding in pathogenicity prediction.

tools.name: reciprologs
tools.one_line_profile: Find reciprocal best hits between sets of sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool to identify reciprocal best hits (orthologs) between two or more sets of sequences using BLAST or DIAMOND.

tools.name: FA-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation pipeline for non-model organisms using Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline designed for the functional annotation of proteins, specifically tailored for non-model organisms, integrating various bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: GenomeAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: Best practices and workflow for genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of workflows and best practices for genome annotation, maintained by Harvard Informatics, facilitating standard annotation tasks.

tools.name: TOGA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to infer Orthologs from Genome Alignments
tools.detailed_description: TOGA implements a paradigm to infer orthologous genes by integrating gene annotation and classifying genes as intact or lost based on genome alignments.

tools.name: TOGA2
tools.one_line_profile: Faster and more versatile successor to TOGA for ortholog inference
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the TOGA tool, offering improved performance and versatility for inferring orthologs from genome alignments.

tools.name: hypro
tools.one_line_profile: Extension for hypothetical protein annotations from Prokka
tools.detailed_description: A tool to extend hypothetical protein annotations generated by Prokka using additional homology searches against larger databases.

tools.name: Prodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes
tools.detailed_description: A widely used microbial gene prediction tool that identifies protein-coding genes in prokaryotic genomes.

tools.name: genome-annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for genome annotation with AUGUSTUS
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline that automates software provisioning to generate hints and subsequent genome model predictions using AUGUSTUS.

tools.name: esga
tools.one_line_profile: Eukaryotic System for Genome Annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A genome annotation pipeline (v2) developed by IKMB for eukaryotic genomes.

tools.name: KEGGaNOG
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mining KEGG pathways completeness from eggNOG-mapper annotations
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool designed to mine and analyze KEGG pathway completeness data derived from eggNOG-mapper annotation outputs.

tools.name: Gmove
tools.one_line_profile: Gene prediction tool integrating RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A gene prediction tool developed by Institut de Genomique, designed to improve gene calling accuracy.

tools.name: AlignQC
tools.one_line_profile: Long read alignment analysis and quality control
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating reports on sequence alignments, analyzing mappability, error patterns, and annotations, specifically for long-read data.

tools.name: AntPack
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for annotation, processing and ML for antibody sequences
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing utilities for the annotation, processing, and machine learning analysis of antibody sequences.

tools.name: BioSeqUtils
tools.one_line_profile: Extract Sequence from Genome According to Annotation File
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to extract specific sequences from genomes based on provided annotation files.

tools.name: gw
tools.one_line_profile: Fast genome browser and variant annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance genome browser and variant annotation tool designed for visualizing sequencing data and variants.

tools.name: functional-annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for functional annotation of genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for functional annotation of genomes by integrating data from RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, and DNase-seq.

tools.name: BIGSdb
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial Isolate Genome Sequence Database platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for gene-by-gene bacterial population annotation and analysis, facilitating the storage and analysis of isolate genome sequence data.

tools.name: PyGenePlexus
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based gene classification library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for network-based gene classification to generate genome-wide predictions about genes functionally similar to an input list.

tools.name: rtracklayer
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to genome annotation files and UCSC genome browser
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to genome annotation files (GFF, BED, etc.) and the UCSC genome browser for data import, export, and visualization.

tools.name: gcv
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Context Viewer for synteny and functional annotations
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for federating genomes and visualizing synteny derived from functional annotations.

tools.name: PARTIE
tools.one_line_profile: Program to partition SRA metagenomics data into amplicon and shotgun data sets
tools.detailed_description: PARTIE is a program to partition sequence read archive (SRA) metagenomics data into amplicon and shotgun data sets. It allows automatic separation of data when user-supplied annotations cannot be trusted.

tools.name: MitoZ
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for assembly, annotation, and visualization of animal mitochondrial genomes
tools.detailed_description: MitoZ is a toolkit for assembly, annotation, and visualization of animal mitochondrial genomes. It provides a comprehensive pipeline for mitochondrial genome analysis.

tools.name: MAGE
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of gene expression and splicing diversity
tools.detailed_description: MAGE performs analysis of gene expression and splicing diversity in samples, including eQTL and sQTL discovery and annotation.

tools.name: Genome-annotation-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive genome annotation pipeline designed to automate the process of annotating genomic sequences.

tools.name: ATLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Three commands to start analyzing your metagenome data
tools.detailed_description: ATLAS is a workflow for metagenome data analysis, providing a simple interface to perform complex metagenomic tasks including assembly, binning, and annotation.

tools.name: epilogos
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for summarizing and visualizing multi-biosample functional genomic annotations
tools.detailed_description: Epilogos provides methods for summarizing and visualizing functional genomic annotations across multiple biosamples, aiding in the interpretation of epigenomic data.

tools.name: mg_annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome Annotation Workflow by NMDC
tools.detailed_description: The Metagenome Annotation Workflow used by the National Microbiome Data Collaborative (NMDC) for annotating metagenomic sequences.

tools.name: mcmcstat
tools.one_line_profile: MCMC toolbox for Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox for Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulation, used for statistical analysis and parameter estimation in scientific modeling.

tools.name: EGAPx
tools.one_line_profile: Eukaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline-External caller scripts
tools.detailed_description: EGAPx is the external interface for the NCBI Eukaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline, allowing users to run the annotation workflow.

tools.name: PGAP
tools.one_line_profile: NCBI Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: PGAP is the NCBI Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline, designed to annotate bacterial and archaeal genomes with high accuracy.

tools.name: VADR
tools.one_line_profile: Viral Annotation DefineR for classification and annotation of viral sequences
tools.detailed_description: VADR (Viral Annotation DefineR) is a suite of tools for classifying and annotating viral sequences based on reference models, widely used for viral pathogen surveillance.

tools.name: FusionCatcher
tools.one_line_profile: Finder of Somatic Fusion Genes in RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: FusionCatcher is a tool for finding somatic fusion genes in RNA-seq data, designed to detect novel and known fusions with high sensitivity.

tools.name: Domainator
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for domain-based gene neighborhood and protein search
tools.detailed_description: Domainator is a flexible and modular software suite for domain-based gene neighborhood analysis, protein search, extraction, and clustering.

tools.name: Funannotate
tools.one_line_profile: Eukaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Funannotate is a pipeline for genome annotation, specifically designed for fungi but applicable to other eukaryotes, integrating evidence from RNA-seq and protein alignments.

tools.name: nf-core/genomeannotator
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for the identification of gene structures in draft genomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the identification of coding gene structures in draft genomes, part of the nf-core community.

tools.name: nf-core/isoseq
tools.one_line_profile: Genome annotation with PacBio Iso-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing PacBio Iso-Seq data to generate Full Length Non-Chimeric (FLNC) sequences and produce genome annotations.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and binning of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for the assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/phageannotator
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for identifying and annotating phage sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for identifying, annotating, and quantifying phage sequences in genomic and metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: nf-core/reportho
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for comparative analysis of ortholog predictions
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the comparative analysis of ortholog predictions, facilitating evolutionary studies.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable bacterial genome assembly, annotation and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: ASAP is a scalable pipeline for bacterial genome assembly, annotation, and analysis, designed to handle large datasets efficiently.

tools.name: Bakta
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid & standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs & plasmids
tools.detailed_description: Bakta is a tool for the rapid and standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), and plasmids.

tools.name: SIFT4G_Create_Genomic_DB
tools.one_line_profile: Create genomic databases with SIFT predictions
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create genomic databases annotated with SIFT predictions, enabling functional impact prediction for variants.

tools.name: CodAn
tools.one_line_profile: CDS prediction in transcripts
tools.detailed_description: CodAn is a tool for predicting Coding DNA Sequences (CDS) in transcripts, useful for transcriptome annotation.

tools.name: ClusterFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting biosynthetic gene clusters in genomes
tools.detailed_description: ClusterFinder is a tool for predicting biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) in genomic sequences, aiding in the discovery of secondary metabolites.

tools.name: BlastViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive graphical viewer for BLAST alignment results
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based graphical user interface for visualizing and analyzing BLAST output files, allowing users to inspect alignments and hits interactively.

tools.name: EPInformer
tools.one_line_profile: Gene expression and gene-enhancer link prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting gene expression and identifying gene-enhancer links using epigenetic features, facilitating regulatory genomics analysis.

tools.name: OGFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering utility for OrthoFinder orthogroup outputs
tools.detailed_description: A script designed to parse OrthoFinder results and filter orthogroups based on specific user-defined criteria, aiding in comparative genomics.

tools.name: partis
tools.one_line_profile: HMM-based B-cell and T-cell receptor sequence annotation and simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Hidden Markov Model framework for annotating BCR and TCR sequences, simulating clonal families, inferring germline sequences, and predicting affinity.

tools.name: merizo_search
tools.one_line_profile: Fast protein domain structure embedding and search tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid protein domain structure search using embeddings, facilitating structural annotation and classification.

tools.name: PAW_BLAST
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for finding orthologs via protein BLAST
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility that automates BLAST searches between protein FASTA files to identify orthologous sequences.

tools.name: annotations
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for adding Swiss-Prot annotations to proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A graphical interface for enriching PAW summary files with rich functional annotations derived from Swiss-Prot flat text files.

tools.name: DupGen_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for identifying duplicated gene pairs and modes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify different modes of gene duplication (e.g., WGD, tandem, proximal) in genomes.

tools.name: HGTector
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-wide prediction of horizontal gene transfer
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline for detecting horizontal gene transfer (HGT) events based on the distribution of sequence homology patterns.

tools.name: PGA
tools.one_line_profile: Plastid Genome Annotator
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for the annotation of plastid genomes, automating the identification of genes, tRNAs, and rRNAs.

tools.name: virulign
tools.one_line_profile: Fast codon-correct alignment and annotation of viral genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for codon-aware alignment and annotation of viral sequences, particularly useful for HIV and other viruses requiring precise reading frame handling.

tools.name: MetaboAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: R package for metabolomics data annotation
tools.detailed_description: High-level functionality to support and simplify the annotation of metabolomics data, integrating with the R for Mass Spectrometry ecosystem.

tools.name: tcga-microbiome-prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer prognosis prediction using tumor microbial abundances
tools.detailed_description: Predictive models and analysis scripts for cancer prognosis and drug response using microbial abundances derived from TCGA sequencing data.

tools.name: Finder
tools.one_line_profile: Automated gene annotator from RNA-Seq expression data
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for gene annotation using RNA-Seq expression data to improve genome annotation accuracy.

tools.name: Artemis
tools.one_line_profile: Genome viewer and annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A free genome viewer and annotation tool that allows visualization of sequence features, analysis results, and six-frame translations.

tools.name: gff3toembl
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Prokka GFF3 to EMBL format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert annotated assemblies in GFF3 format (from Prokka) to EMBL format for submission to EBI/ENA.

tools.name: MicroFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to order FASTA files by microchromosome specific genes
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby script designed to identify and order sequences based on microchromosome-specific gene content, aiding in genome assembly curation.

tools.name: AlleleFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying allele genes from polyploid genomes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for identifying allelic gene pairs or groups within polyploid genomes, facilitating the study of polyploid evolution and genetics.

tools.name: kmerseek
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient protein domain annotation search with reduced amino acid k-mers
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool for fast protein domain search and annotation using reduced amino acid alphabets and k-mer indexing.

tools.name: esmologs
tools.one_line_profile: Local homology search powered by ESM-2 language model
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging the ESM-2 protein language model, Foldseek, and HMMER for sensitive local homology search and annotation.

tools.name: hmmer3di
tools.one_line_profile: HMMER3 patched to support the 3di alphabet (Foldseek)
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of HMMER3 and Easel library to support the 3di (3D interaction) alphabet used by Foldseek for structural alignment.

tools.name: HMMER2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Annotate DNA sequences for Gene Ontology terms
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to map DNA sequences to Gene Ontology (GO) terms using HMMER searches against Pfam or other HMM databases.

tools.name: Transposome
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for annotation of transposable element families
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for annotating and analyzing transposable element families directly from unassembled sequence reads.

tools.name: PCfun
tools.one_line_profile: Functional annotation of protein complexes using text mining
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the functions of protein complexes using machine learning models trained on PubMed Central full-text word embeddings.

tools.name: shotmap
tools.one_line_profile: Shotgun Metagenome Annotation Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the functional annotation of shotgun metagenomic data, identifying gene families and metabolic pathways.

tools.name: pprodigal
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized wrapper for Prodigal gene prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that parallelizes the execution of the Prodigal gene prediction tool to speed up annotation of large datasets.

tools.name: slncky
tools.one_line_profile: lncRNA discovery and orthology analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering high-quality noncoding transcripts, discovering lncRNA orthologs, and characterizing their evolution from RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: annotationweb
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based annotation system for medical image sequences
tools.detailed_description: A web tool for annotating image sequences, such as ultrasound and camera recordings, primarily for training machine learning models in medical imaging.

tools.name: Phyling
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic inference pipeline from annotated genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for extracting orthologs from annotated genomes and performing phylogenetic inference.

tools.name: DEcode
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction model for differential gene expression
tools.detailed_description: A model for predicting differential gene expression based on genome-wide regulatory interactions.

tools.name: mousipy
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to map mouse gene symbols to human orthologs in AnnData
tools.detailed_description: A utility to translate AnnData objects with mouse gene symbols into human gene symbols by mapping orthologs, facilitating cross-species analysis.

tools.name: autoprokka
tools.one_line_profile: Automation wrapper for Prokka genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A script that automates the execution of Prokka on a directory of FASTA genomes and organizes the output files.

tools.name: TISSUE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty estimation for spatial transcriptomics imputation
tools.detailed_description: Tools for estimating uncertainty measures for gene expression predictions in single-cell spatial transcriptomics datasets.

tools.name: jcvi
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Python library for genome assembly and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and libraries to facilitate genome assembly, annotation, and comparative genomics analysis.

tools.name: annotateMaf
tools.one_line_profile: Add functional variant annotation to MAF files
tools.detailed_description: An R tool to add functional variant annotations to Mutation Annotation Format (MAF) files, useful in cancer genomics.

tools.name: seq-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scripts for sequence conversion and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A set of utility scripts for sequence format conversion, feature annotation, and general sequence analysis tasks.

tools.name: ISfinder-sequences
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of Insertion Sequences from ISfinder
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Insertion Sequence (IS) elements retrieved from the ISfinder database, serving as a reference dataset for annotation.

tools.name: msabrowser
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic visualization of sequence alignments and annotations
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript-based tool for the dynamic and fast visualization of multiple sequence alignments (MSA), variations, and annotations.

tools.name: EcoFoldDB
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure-guided functional annotation pipeline for metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A database and pipeline that utilizes protein structure predictions to annotate ecologically relevant functions in metagenomic data, enhancing functional resolution beyond sequence homology.

tools.name: reciprocal_smallest_distance
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise orthology detection algorithm using evolutionary distance
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm (RSD) that detects orthologs between genomes by using global sequence alignment and maximum likelihood evolutionary distance estimation, improving upon reciprocal best hits.

tools.name: PGPg_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating Plant-Growth Promotion Genes in genomes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line workflow designed for the annotation of Plant-Growth Promotion Genes (PGPg) in bacterial genomes and metagenomes, offering flexible pre-configured workflows.

tools.name: parascopy
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number estimation and variant calling for duplicated genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for estimating copy numbers and calling variants in duplicated gene regions using Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) data, addressing challenges in paralogous sequence analysis.

tools.name: barrnap
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid ribosomal RNA predictor for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the location of ribosomal RNA genes in genomes (bacteria, archaea, mitochondria, eukaryotes) using HMMER3.

tools.name: noary
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight nucleotide bacterial ortholog clustering tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for clustering bacterial nucleotide sequences to find orthologs, designed to be lightweight and fast.

tools.name: prokka
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid prokaryotic genome annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A widely used software tool for the rapid annotation of prokaryotic genomes, coordinating a suite of existing tools to predict coding sequences, rRNAs, tRNAs, and other features.

tools.name: brrrr
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance biological sequence processing tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Rust-based tools to process biological sequences (FASTA/FASTQ) and annotations (GFF) into modern file formats like Parquet and JSON for efficient analysis.

tools.name: DRAMPower
tools.one_line_profile: DRAM power and energy estimation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating the power and energy consumption of Dynamic Random Access Memory (DRAM) based on JEDEC standards, used in computer architecture research.

tools.name: DRAMSys
tools.one_line_profile: SystemC TLM-2.0 based DRAM simulator
tools.detailed_description: A flexible DRAM subsystem simulator based on SystemC TLM-2.0, allowing for the exploration of DRAM architectures and controllers in computer engineering research.

tools.name: NucDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for characterizing differences between DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool that locates and categorizes differences between two sets of DNA sequences, providing detailed annotation of structural variants and mutations.

tools.name: DRAMSim2
tools.one_line_profile: Cycle accurate DRAM simulator
tools.detailed_description: A cycle-accurate memory system simulator for DDR2/DDR3 memory systems, widely used in computer architecture research for performance modeling.

tools.name: DRAMsim3
tools.one_line_profile: Cycle-accurate, thermal-capable DRAM simulator
tools.detailed_description: The successor to DRAMSim2, adding support for newer memory standards (HBM, DDR4) and thermal modeling for memory systems research.

tools.name: Genome-Wide-Annotation-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for eukaryotic whole genome annotation
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline combining multiple software tools to perform comprehensive whole genome annotation for eukaryotes.

tools.name: FragGeneScanRs
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance gene prediction for short reads
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of the FragGeneScan model, optimized for speed and memory efficiency in predicting genes from short, error-prone sequencing reads.

tools.name: TE_finder
tools.one_line_profile: Transposable element search and annotation suite
tools.detailed_description: A suite of C++ programs for searching and annotating transposable elements (TEs) in large eukaryotic genomes, part of the REPET package.

tools.name: orfipy
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and flexible Open Reading Frame (ORF) finder
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for finding Open Reading Frames (ORFs) in nucleotide sequences, optimized for speed and flexibility with various search parameters.

tools.name: Helixer
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for gene annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses deep learning to predict gene annotations directly from DNA sequence data, aiming to improve annotation accuracy.

tools.name: mehari
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance variant effect predictor
tools.detailed_description: A VEP-like tool written in Rust for performing sequence ontology and HGVS annotation of VCF files, designed for speed and efficiency.

tools.name: AmpliconArchitect
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for reconstructing focal amplifications and viral integrations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to identify connected genomic regions with simultaneous copy number amplification and elucidate the architecture of the amplicon from NGS data.

tools.name: orthologsBioMART
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for mapping orthologous genes using ENSEMBL BioMART
tools.detailed_description: A utility script/library for mapping orthologous genes between species in R and Python by interfacing with the ENSEMBL BioMART database.

tools.name: drammer
tools.one_line_profile: Rowhammer vulnerability tester for Android
tools.detailed_description: A native binary tool used in hardware security research to test for the Rowhammer bug on Android devices, demonstrating physical bit flips in DRAM.

tools.name: SSS-test
tools.one_line_profile: Selection on the Secondary Structure test
tools.detailed_description: A test that detects positive and negative selection from a set of orthologs (small or long ncRNAs) by analyzing secondary structure conservation.

tools.name: SpaDiT
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Transformer for Spatial Gene Expression Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (Diffusion Transformer) for predicting spatial gene expression patterns using scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: supermatrix
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for supermatrix alignment construction
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts to process, join, split, or add new proteins to a supermatrix alignment using HMMs, useful in phylogenomics.

tools.name: afra
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based genome annotation editor
tools.detailed_description: A browser-based tool for community curation and editing of genome annotations, designed to be accessible ('Genome Annotation for the Masses').

tools.name: hmmer-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust interface to HMMER
tools.detailed_description: An ergonomic Rust library providing bindings and interfaces to the HMMER software suite for sequence analysis.

tools.name: possvm-orthology
tools.one_line_profile: Ortholog clustering in phylogenies
tools.detailed_description: A tool to find clusters of orthologs in phylogenies using species overlap and MCL clustering, aiding in phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: csORF-finder
tools.one_line_profile: Small peptide-coding ORF identifier
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for identifying Open Reading Frames (ORFs) that have the ability to code for small peptides.

tools.name: annotate_v
tools.one_line_profile: Antibody VH and VL sequence annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to annotate antibody variable heavy (VH) and variable light (VL) sequences, specifically identifying Framework Regions (FR) and Complementarity Determining Regions (CDR).

tools.name: DeepMNE-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for gene function prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a deep neural network method integrating multi-network topology for gene function prediction.

tools.name: AnnoPred
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic risk prediction integrating functional annotations
tools.detailed_description: A method for genetic risk prediction that integrates Linkage Disequilibrium (LD) information and functional annotations to improve accuracy.

tools.name: HGT-Finder
tools.one_line_profile: Horizontal gene transfer detection tool
tools.detailed_description: A program for identifying horizontal gene transfer events based on BLAST results.

tools.name: GECCO
tools.one_line_profile: Biosynthetic gene cluster prediction with CRFs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) in genomic sequences using Conditional Random Fields (CRFs).

tools.name: EMGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for Cancer Gene Prediction
tools.detailed_description: An Explainable Multilayer Graph Neural Network model designed for the prediction of cancer driver genes.

tools.name: seqminer
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for querying genomic sequence data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for efficiently querying and retrieving data from VCF, BCF, BGEN, and PLINK files, facilitating genomic data analysis.

tools.name: SparsePro
tools.one_line_profile: GWAS fine-mapping with functional annotation
tools.detailed_description: A fine-mapping method that integrates GWAS summary statistics and functional annotation data to identify causal variants.
